concept.title: API Export
concept.shortdesc: This document discusses how to export a device driver API.

conbody.p: A driver can export its API to be used by other Kernel code by using EXPORT_C in the declaration and IMPORT_C in the definition. When the driver is built, these functions are exported to a .def file. The .def file is specific to the platform to which the driver is built.

Kernel extensions can also provide information to user programs by setting attributes that can be read through the system HAL (Hardware Abstration Layer) API. See Handler Implementation for more information on this.
